ids.description: Contains course identifiers; only one ID type is allowed.

access.description: Defines access times for the exam.

exam.description: Exam schema ensuring required and optional fields meet validation criteria.

deliverySystem.description: Must be validated against available systems.

signon.description: Optional signon object.. If provided, integrationSid must be present. This will return the signon information to redirect the user to.

tier.description: Tier must be a positive whole number

name.description: Name is required and cannot be empty
